Title: Requires the department of health to publish certain information relating to home care services usage on the department's website on a quarterly basis
Summary: Requires the commissioner of health to publish certain information relating to home care services usage on the department's website on a quarterly basis.
LawCode: Add ยง3614-g, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to reporting of home care service usage
